title: CID probing 57 misleading rumors circulated during state of emergency  Police
content: The Police Media Spokesman, ASP F.U. Wootler, declared that stern legal action will be taken against individuals circulating false or misleading information during the state of emergency currently in effect across Sri Lanka. MORE..
